name: identifier
label: Identifier
description: Name or other identifier of an entry from a biosample database. (EDAM:data_3273, NCIT:C93400 )

name: alternativeidentifiers
label: Alternative identifiers
description: A backup sequence of characters used to identify an entity. (NCIT:C90353 )

name: collectedfromsubject
label: Collected from subject
description: Reference to the subject from whom this material was collected. (SIO:000244, NCIT:C142495 )

name: belongstorequest
label: Belongs to request
description: A sequence of letters, numbers, or other characters that specifically identifies a particular order. (NCIT:C164567 )

name: belongstodiagnosis
label: Belongs to diagnosis
description: Reference to a diagnosis c.q. clinical examination of which this material may be a part of. There can be multiple diagnoses when a non-tumor material is reused as reference. (SIO:000068 )

name: dateofrequest
label: Date of request
description: The date on which the activity or entity was ordered. (NCIT:C164566 )

name: reasonforsampling
label: Reason for sampling
description: The explanation for why a test, measurement, or assessment is executed. (NCIT:C171003 )

name: samplingdate
label: Sampling date
description: The date that a sample was collected or obtained. (NCIT:C164024 )

name: samplingtimestamp
label: Sampling timestamp
description: Date and time at which this material was collected. (EFO:0000689 )

name: registrationtimestamp
label: Registration timestamp
description: Date and time at which this material was listed or recorded officially, i.e. officially qualified or enrolled. (NCIT:C25646 )

name: samplingprotocoltext
label: Sampling protocol text
description: The procedure whereby this material was sampled for an analysis. (EFO:0005518 )

name: samplingprotocolreference
label: Sampling protocol reference
description: The procedure whereby this material was sampled for an analysis. (EFO:0005518 )

name: samplingprotocoldeviation
label: Sampling protocol deviation
description: A variation from processes or procedures defined in the sampling protocol. Deviations usually do not preclude the overall evaluability of subject data for either efficacy or safety, and are often acknowledged and accepted in advance by the sponsor. (NCIT:C50996 )

name: reasonforsamplingprotocoldeviation
label: Reason for sampling protocol deviation
description: The rationale for why a deviation from the sampling protocol has occurred. (NCIT:C93529 )

name: biospecimentype
label: Biospecimen type
description: The type of material taken from a biological entity for testing, diagnostic, propagation, treatment or research purposes. (NCIT:C70713 )

name: anatomicalsource
label: Anatomical source
description: Biological entity that constitutes the structural organization of an individual member of a biological species from which this material was taken. (NCIT:C103264 )

name: pathologicalstate
label: Pathological state
description: The pathological state of the tissue from which this material was derived. (GO:0001894 )

name: biospecimenusability
label: Biospecimen usability
description: An indication as to whether a biospecimen is suitable for testing purposes. (NCIT:C171004 )

name: storageconditions
label: Storage conditions
description: The conditions under which this biological material was stored. (NCIT:C96145 )

name: expirationdate
label: Expiration date
description: The date beyond which this material is no longer regarded as fit for use. (NCIT:C164516 )

name: percentagetumorcells
label: Percentage tumor cells
description: The percentage of tumor cells compared to total cells present in this material. (NCIT:C127771 )

name: physicallocation
label: Physical location
description: A place on the Earth where this material is located, by its name or by its geographical location. This definition is intentionally vague to allow reuse locally (e.g. which freezer), for contacting (e.g. which institute), broadly for logistical or legal reasons (e.g. city, country or continent). (GAZ:00000448 )

name: analysesperformed
label: Analyses performed
description: Reports the existence of any analyses performed on this material other than genomics (e.g. transcriptomics, metabolomics, proteomics). (IAO:0000702 )

name: derivedfrom
label: Derived from
description: Indicate if this material was produced from or related to another. (NCIT:C28355 )

name: partofdatarelease
label: Part of data release
description: The act of making data or other structured information accessible to the public or to the user group of a database. (NCIT:C172217 )
